forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: undo

comments.text: you can undo a placement movement by context-lasering the placement, then hitting the back-arrow undo icon there.
similarly, during creation you can context-laser thing parts to undo the last movement from there.
if you accidentally deleted a creation, you can also open your inventory (by grabbing from your back) and tapping the trash icon.
to prevent accidental movements, you can also hit the lock icon on thing and thing part context dialogs.

thread.latestCommentText: to prevent accidental movements, you can also hit the lock icon on thing and thing part context dialogs.
